Actions.Name: Collect Bounty
Actions.Effects: Can only be used against bloodied targets or the Bounty Target.

Actions.Name: Kick Off
Actions.Effects: The [name] flies 1. Before they fly, they may shove an adjacent character 1 space, then deal 2 damage to them if they are a foe. If they do, they fly 3 instead.

Actions.Name: Lasso
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 is shoved 1 towards the [name].
Actions.Effects: Against the bounty target, shoves them 2 instead and dazes them.

Actions.Name: Stun Bomb
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes are dazed. Dazed foes or the bounty target takes 4 damage.
